title: SLPP MPs Sanath Nishantha & Milan Jayatilake arrested
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); SLPP MP Sanath Nishantha has been arrested by the Criminal Investigations Department over violent incidents which took place at Galle Face and Colpetty on 9th May.
CID arrests two more suspects over MP Amarakeerthi Athukorala’s death
Government had the ability to prevent attack on GGG: Gammanpila
